description:
This course is specifically for professional who are ready to succeed.

Although test professional examples are used in this presentation; the career strategy and concepts work for developers, business analysts, program managers and many other IT roles.

In March of 2014 – Triangle Information System Quality Association 2014 held their IT Conference.It was a great event and had several tracks discussing the future of the IT industry in general.The unanimous consensus was that IT and Testing is NOT Dead – but it is changing.

This discussion starts where the conference left off. We’re taking that next step from the future of the Software Industry in general – to your individual career path in IT. If the industry is constantly changing and advancing, what does that mean for our professional and career advancement in this field?

What does our career paths look like?

And what do we have to look forward to in advancement and promotion opportunities?

This course will open some doors that you may not have been previously aware of and even shine some additional light on opportunities that you were aware of.
title: Advanced Careers in IT and How to Get Them
